description: Designed for long-distance comfort, this pack will help you graduate past weekend trips. Everything you need and nothing you don’t, the Jade 63 is the ideal size for extended backcountry stays and the suspension will be a treat to minimalist-inclined outdoor enthusiasts. Thoughtful details include a rain cover and built-in ventilation.Body fabric is 210 nylon ripstop with 630-denier high density nylon at the base for abrasion resistance.Low-profile Free Float trampoline style back panel adds ventilation without sacrificing load management or robbing volume to stash stuff inside.Adjustable torso length lets you dial in the perfect fit.Die-cut foam shoulder straps and hip belt for breathability.Lumbar foam for added comfort with a full pack.Women's specific shoulder straps and hipbelt are shaped to fit women's smaller and curvier bodies.U-shape zippered access to main compartment, with spin-drift collar under floating lid.Bottom zippered sleeping bag compartment has a removable internal divider.2 exterior stretch water bottle pockets, a front stretch pocket and zippered lid pocket with key clip.Loops to hold trekking poles and your sunglasses (on the shoulder strap).Includes a rain cover with its own dedicated pocket.Designed for loads up to 18kg/40lbs.
name: Gregory Jade 63 Backpack - Women's
